item0.name: Forbidden Idol
item0.description:
10% Heal and Shield Power
50% Base Mana Regen

item1.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item1.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item2.name: Staff of Flowing Water
item2.description:
50 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Rapids: Healing or Shielding an ally grants you both 15% Move Speed and 20 - 40 (ally ) Ability Power for 3 seconds.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item3.name: Ardent Censer
item3.description:
60 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Sanctify: Healing or Shielding an ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting your Attacks 10% - 30% (based on ally level) Attack Speed and 5 - 20 (based on ally level) magic damage On-Hit.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item4.name: Shard of True Ice
item4.description:
40 Ability Power
75 Health
100% Base Mana Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item5.name: Imperial Mandate
item5.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal 36 - 60 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds. (6s cooldown per champion) Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Summon Aery
perk0.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

item0.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item0.description:

45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item2.name: Frostfang
item2.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
75% Base Mana Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
  • Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
  • Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Shard of True Ice.

    This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

item0.name: Chemtech Putrifier
item0.description:
50 Ability Power
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding an ally will cause their next damage to enemy champions to apply 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.name: Shard of True Ice
item3.description:
40 Ability Power
75 Health
100% Base Mana Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item4.name: Staff of Flowing Water
item4.description:
50 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Rapids: Healing or Shielding an ally grants you both 15% Move Speed and 20 - 40 (ally ) Ability Power for 3 seconds.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item5.name: Imperial Mandate
item5.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal 36 - 60 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds. (6s cooldown per champion) Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).
